## set_parliament_details

## Description
 Set parliament details 


## Usage
```r
 
set_parliament_details( 
  ., 
  number_of_seats = NULL, 
  hemicycle_arc = NULL, 
  circle_inner = NULL, 
  number_of_rows = NULL, 
  use_hover_animation = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| number_of_seats | Number of seats. This number is ignored if the value is lower than the actual number of seats in your data Min: 1. Max: 40000 |
| hemicycle_arc | Size of arc. In degrees. Min: 10. Max: 360 |
| circle_inner | Inner space. As a % of the circle. Max: 90 |
| number_of_rows | Number of Rows. Min: 1 |
| use_hover_animation | Highlight parties on hover. Boolean (True/False) |
